translations: n．格言，箴言：简洁有力的陈述，通常包含普遍真理或道德教诲。
· The old dictums 'honesty is the best policy' still holds true.
古老的格言“诚实是上策”依然成立。

sentences.sentence: Plenty of free celebrated dictums, masterpieces and speeches especially make for you. Now download the Kingsoft Powerword APP and enjoy yourself!
sentences.translation: 全部免费，想要高逼格，下载词霸，每天跟读专为你定制的名言、名著、演讲！
